body:
So..yeah. 

I'm Ludchi / Theo. Call me what you want. I'm currently residing in Sweden, outside Stockholm in a city called ''Sollentuna''. It takes about 30 minutes to travel to Stockholm from Sollentuna. Also i love playing sports. I'm currently playing a sport called Floorball. I used to play football before. Also i made this post / AMA to get more ''attention'' in this community, and such. 

Carry on asking.

title: My old AMA died. Let's make a new one
